name: Cream horn adventure
description:
"Tia," the girl who goes home with Cream horn ingredients.

But... an uninvited guest stole Tia's chocolate conch bread ingredients!

Tia's adventure to find ingredients for chocolate conch bread begins!

* Simple jump game to enjoy!

* Solve various puzzle elements on the stage.~

* If you listen to all the requests of your friends on stage, good things will happen?!
